message:
Dear {{ doc.employee_name }},

I trust this message finds you well.

We would like to formally inform you that the process of your confirmation has been initiated. As part of this procedure, the required evaluations and approvals will be conducted in accordance with our company policies and guidelines.

You will be duly notified once a final decision has been made regarding your confirmation. We sincerely appreciate your patience and continued dedication throughout this process.

Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Warm regards,

HR Team
name: Inform Employee about Confirmation Process
subject: Initiation of Your Confirmation Process
